mapper.insert: insert into members (user_id, user_name, user_pwd, user_email, user_sido, user_gugun, salt) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{userEmail}, #{userSido}, #{userGugun}, #{salt})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name from members where user_id = #{userId} and user_pwd = #{userPwd}
select salt from members where user_id = #{userId}
